short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes the words 'soft serve' to 'creemee,' because creemees are so much better than soft serve. #teamcreemee

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You enjoy creemees â€” maple and otherwise. You want them in your life all the time. None of that "soft serve" baloney, because "soft serve" sounds like a terrible tennis move.

With this extension, you can ditch the term-that-must-not-be-named once and for all. Whenever you reach a news article or blog that mentions "soft serve," this extension will translate it to the much yummier "creemee" and the world will be happier.
